properties.areaDesc: Reno Beach to The Islands OH; Maumee Bay to Reno Beach OH; The Islands to Vermilion OH
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 12 at 3:50AM EST until January 12 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Low Water Advisory, abnormally low water
levels. For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 15 to 25
knots with gusts up to 35 knots and waves 1 to 4 feet.

* WHERE...Portions of central and western Lake Erie.

* WHEN...For the Low Water Advisory, until 4 PM EST this
afternoon. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM EST this
morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Below
normal water levels will result in hazardous navigating
conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As of 4 AM Sunday, the water level at
Toledo was 43 inches above low water datum, or 19 inches above
the critical mark for save navigation. West winds this morning
will cause water levels to drop to near or just below the
critical mark. Water levels will return above the critical mark
by this afternoon.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...LOW WATER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
